website_summaries.verdict: The waterproof EarFun Air, like its slightly cheaper sibling, delivers powerful audio performance for a sweet sub-$100 price.
pros: Rich bass depth and bright highs

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps The Last Pair Of Earbuds You'll Ever Buy
customer_reviews.text: The excellent design in both form and function make these earbuds one of the best audio purchases ever made. It is easy to see much thought has gone not only into presentation but ergonomics and sound quality as well. Beautifully packaged, they are a delight to receive. The instructions are clear and straight-forward and a choice of four sizes of ear tips make fit for the most discerning user a dream. This was important for me as earbuds do not normally fit me so well. Operation is quite intuitive while offering all the needed functions. I was amazed at how well the Earfun Air integrated into my day and brought dynamic personal sound in an elegant yet simple package.
customer_reviews.author: PennyPincher

customer_reviews.title: It’s a steal for a high quality Bluetooth earbuds  under £60!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is brilliant for the price. What I like most is the wireless charging technology of this device. I think EarFun blew the AirPods here big time! My only gripe is it only comes in black colour. I’m hoping for the white colour to arrive soon. Pretty satisfied customer here. Highly recommended! Update: There was a little technical problem with the left earbud awhile ago but, instead of returning the item I followed the troubleshooting process and it was resolved. Now I'm a happy bunny again!
customer_reviews.author: crownasia

customer_reviews.title: Worth for the money. Amazing sound  and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Sounds quality perfect. Also very well packaging very classy though. Very easy to pairing as it shows on the picture. If you don’t want to put it in the case than that’s fine. You can still pairing through Bluetooth option by choosing “Earfun” it is connecting. I called my sis, and voice quality perfect and looks like it blocking the noise as well as I did not hear anything during the phone call. They are so nice to put extra Ear tips which I am quiet into hygiene. I was planing to give this to my sis but it’s mine now. She has to wait for the Xmas.
customer_reviews.author: sabriye

customer_reviews.title: Really good product!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this product as the sound quality is really good, the shape and sturdiness of the product is surprisingly alright and it allows for a good range for bluetooth. this is an overall good product. the case looks professional and provide good connection for the earphone to charge, and the microphones of the earphones are really good, would definetly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Doru Slobozeanu

customer_reviews.title: Best sound quality and design
customer_reviews.text: These wireless earphones are truly the best ones I have ordered. They have good sound quality with noise cancelling functions too. The design is also very elegant and user friendly. They have touch functions s o no need to press any buttons or take out your mobile phone again and again to change volume or songs. The battery lasts easily for 24hrs with 6-7 hour play time without box. You can use them in gym or during workouts with absolute comfort . Best investment for the quality product you get. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shafaat

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and good call quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a few high end headphones (What Hi-Fi 5 stars) with my Android phones (currently a Huawei P30 Pro) and the sound quality have all been good but the call quality when I’m talking has been bad, making those others headphones redundant. These EarFuns have been brilliant with music and call quality. Really impressed and very happy. They’re comfortable in the ear and great to have a solid case too. Only negatives I can find is that they’re fiddly to get out of the case, and the touch controls aren’t sensitive enough. Hardly deal breaking. Would highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Friend

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value for money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used many earphones over the years mainly for listening to the radio at night and these are among the best I’ve had. Comfortable to wear. Long battery life and also quick to charge. The quality of sound is more than good enough for what I need them for. Price also impressive. Thoroughly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Great value quality wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are very comfortable to wear with decent sound quality. I use them when running and have had no problems with sweat or rain. The Bluetooth connection is Good with almost no drop-out. Battery life is excellent and the touch control works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tommo

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like that the charging case can also be a box for them for traveling. They look smart and work no problem. Sound quality is good. No problems with battery life. My only very small down side is noise cancellation which for me could be a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: W.Glowicka

customer_reviews.title: Cheap airpods
customer_reviews.text: Been using these since Tuesday and they seem to have decent connectivity as I can walk a decent amount of distance without them cutting off. The quality of the sound is really good and they also fit in my ears nicely, good product
customer_reviews.author: Leon Dixon

customer_reviews.title: One happy customer
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible for the price! The sound quality is really good, they’re super comfortable (and this is usually an issue for me cause of my tiny ears) and the battery is amazing! There’s been no issues with connectivity either! The touch controls are a little bit tricky, you have to learn the certain timing for it to register but not a problem when you get used to it! I can’t say much for the call quality, the one time I’ve tried it so far the other end said it was crackly but could’ve been bad reception. Over all I’d highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can rival with the big name brands.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a lot a differ types of earphones and headphones and these are up there with the best. These can rival the big name and at a huge discount. They have 4 microphones that give exceptional call quality. With 4 different ear plug sizes helps give great noise cancellation and comfortable ear fitting.
customer_reviews.author: John Benson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece of tech
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, easy to use and the features you can do by just touching the ear phones are really cool. I like being able to pause and skip songs without using my mobile. The background noise cancellation feature works amazingly too. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Quality wireless ear pod
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my wife to replace the wired earphone. Really impressed by the look of the products, the container feels good too. Easy to pairing with mobile phone and pods can sit in ears comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Snow

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Received the item very fast and I am really impressed. Before opening the item you can just tell for the price you paid it's good quality. It came full boxed and the earphones itself are amazing quality. You can charge it with a usb c cable. The sound quality is just like any top branded earphones. Bass is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Adam motorwala

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and feature packed wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: The EarFun Air are a good pair of all-round headphones. The touch controls are easy to use and built in microphones are very useful for taking calls. My slight niggle is that the treble quality is a bit flat and can occasionally be drowned/muffled in bass heavy music. But for the price, they are a decent proposition
customer_reviews.author: Baljit Singh

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality, has a lot of bass and phone call quality is very good. Very convenient as you can charge using usb c cable or even wirelessly. The touch controls also work perfectly. Different sized buds are provided which fit comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Ahsan

customer_reviews.title: Connection issues from day 2
customer_reviews.text: Sounds quality is fine and they were working great for about 24 hours. After this only one earphone connects until you reset the earbuds, but every time you disconnect you have to reset again. Only one of the ear buds was charging properly. Returning after 10 days of owning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these, nice bass, looks and feels class
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, originally i am weary about amazon reviews, but these headphones have lived upto expectations, they sound great, respond well, amazing quality, really happy with my purchase.They sit well in my ears, and they cancel out the noise really well. money well spent
customer_reviews.author: Kalpesh Chavda

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST
customer_reviews.text: This is the best pair of wireless earbuds out there and I cannot stress this enough. The sound quality is excellent. The touch gestures work flawlessly and they fit in my ears perfectly. Best budget earphones out there by far.
customer_reviews.author: Michalis Papamichael

customer_reviews.title: Volume Control
customer_reviews.text: Headphones are adequate and comparable to branded versions but the volume control is a slight hit and miss. Otherwise for the price point the build and sound quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Anis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good and very clear. Cancels background noise, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hazara Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Noice!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product at a great price with great sound, very happy I found these.
customer_reviews.author: george mckeown

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Different size earbuds are a must and are provided as you need to find the right size to maximise the sound. Good solid product with prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: MR S.

customer_reviews.title: Missing
customer_reviews.text: Product came without the manual or the extra ear size adapters
customer_reviews.author: Ms. M. A. Sorrentino

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, sound great and worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am really impressed with these earphones, they are excellent for the price! Let’s even remove the price from the equation, they simply sound awesome and also feel very comfortable. Ergonomics are great as well as the features on the earphone for touch controls. You won’t be disappointed buying these, I know I am not and I’m into music, Hifi and music production. They just sound great. The charging case is also high quality, I should add that there is a magnetic element which men’s if you happen to open the case upside down the earphones won’t fall out. Worth the 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: If you really like to listen to music do not buy this
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of good reviews about this headphones but it is not true. People who are reviewing this does not know how music should sound. Low frequencies are okay which it makes you feel the quality is acceptable but all mid frequencies are missing with this headphones. So what it means is that all songs have noisy background sound and very bad quality which in my point of view, is not acceptable. Please if you like music do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: albert

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality and noise cancellation is very good
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these for around 4-5 weeks now and they are so handy... The sound quality and the sound cancellation is very good and it just cancels the noise when you're out and about and you can hear your music and calls perfectly in your ears on the go. The battery life is unreal, feels like I hardly charge it and I never manage to use enough to drain the battery fully. It is very clever as well as when you take out the earphones the music auto stops playing and when you put them back in, it starts playing again... very cool feature!
customer_reviews.author: Saulo Ng

customer_reviews.title: Wow amazing buds at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Received the buds which were well packaged in retail packaging. I was hoping the quality was okay due to the price in comparison to major brands. I am amazed by the sound quality and touch controls on the buds. The case is very good quality and battery life is very good for the average user. Using the buds for phone calls is very clear when talking and cancells out noise compared to my old bluetooth earpiece. Overall I would recommend these buds as they are great for the price paid!
customer_reviews.author: K Skengy

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound, poor touch
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of these headphones is absolutley brilliant as the WhatHifi review says. Can't be faulted at this price. My issue is with the touch controls. Pausing the track should be one touch but invariably it doesn't work the first time. then you try again and it might work, then you try again and it skips a track. Quite frustrating. They connect very quickly. Battery life is excellent With better touch controls these would be the best bang for buck out there.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Prettejohn

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: Updated. Now had these about 2 months. They're OK. Paired very easily. Sound OK for the price. Not the greatest bass. Eartips are not great. I don't think they'll last long and I can't finds specific replacements online. Eartips would be better at noise reduction and bass enhancement (occlusion effect) if they were foam not thin silicon. I've found that shure earbuds fit and significantly enhance the sound, but you'll have to take them off to fit the buds in the charger. I wouldn't buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony O'Connell

customer_reviews.title: pricey but worth it
customer_reviews.text: certainly a bit more pricey than other brands on amazon but certainly worth it. these are better than the philips set they replaced and ideal for our drivers in the vans. they use these while working and they last the entire 37 hour working week. no issues so far. no distortion, disconnection, inability to pair etc. the sound quality is exceptional too and they sit in the ear perfectly well. no fatigue despite wearing them all day. very happy
customer_reviews.author: kacy!+*^

customer_reviews.title: Great present for a great friend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a friends birthday which was celebrated last night. I know she is a bit of an audiophile, and cares about sound quality and it seems as though I made the right choice here. I charged them up for here before gifting which was easy and quick enough. As soon as she tried them I could tell by her expression that she was happy with them. They are a bit pricey, but if they are that good then they are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: BrendonL

customer_reviews.title: Buy now
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of kit, fantastic. Sound quality is amazing. In fact everything about it is great. Pairs so easily with my phone, holds a really good charge and sooo comfortable. I've tried air pod style ones and they are OK but after not that long start to hurt your ears, I've worn these for hours while travelling and forgot they were still in as they were so comfortable. I have bought another pair for my son for xmas
customer_reviews.author: noel

customer_reviews.title: Good price good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good quality earbud! The noise cancellation works well and sound quality is really top notch. I like how it came with earpieces of different sizes, so it can be worn comfortably. It charges pretty fast and battery lasts a long time too. Pairing to devices is also easy and quick, i had no problem with it at all. Design-wise, it is a bit bulkier than regular Airpods, as you can see in the side by side comparison, but still a simple and nice design. The tap control feedback is a bit delayed sometimes, but it’s not too bad. For the price we’re paying, these earbuds are definitely really well made.
customer_reviews.author: hillary

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a replacement for a pair of Tiksounds Wireless Earbuds which were rubbish and did not work straight out of the box. These worked perfectly out of the box wanted them as my house circumstances changed and couldn't use iMac speakers for a while. Were easy to pair and worked straight away. Sound is clear and earbuds fit brilliantly. Coverage is great room to room and am using them with iPad pro as well. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good but needs some extras
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after reading a positive review in whathifi. They were awarded 5 stars so i had to try them out. Mostly what I've experienced has been all positive. The level of sound is good and it doesn't sound tinny or too bassy. Volume is pretty good but at highest volumes it does distort ever so slightly. Connectivity is really easy and I'm happy with battery life too. If they included waterproofing (for gym use), aptx or a better mic they would be 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kelci Duggan

customer_reviews.title: all you will ever need
customer_reviews.text: I have owned a number of pairs of wireless earbuds, this by far has been the best so far. They arrived in their own retail box and look the part straight away. you can feel the quality straight away. The earphones are packed nicely in to a small case with a leather effect lid. clean and crisps design earbuds with in. The quality of sound is the best i have had so far, sound clear with good base. battary life is also another thump up. altough the control is not the easiest to use, but it does what is suppose to do very well.
customer_reviews.author: bart18

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT IN-EAR SOUND
customer_reviews.text: These are incredible value ear pods which rival the Apple version. There is a wonderful sound from them and they are one of the best in-ear noise cancelling pods I have used - that is a difficult thing to achieve! They are a great price and look great. The fit is really good and the sound is impeccable. Give these a go for something a little difference to rival the big boys.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Very good budget earphones
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to connect to my LG smart TV, which they did with no problems. These were recommended by What HiFi in the 'under £50' category. I'm no expert on sound quality but they seem fine to me. My only niggle is that they're difficult to get out of the case. They don't have a noise cancelling feature, but I knew that before I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Maid Marian

customer_reviews.title: Good quality earbuds, fair price
customer_reviews.text: The EarFun Air True earbuds and modern and stylish earbuds with similarities to design to the apple ones. They are of great quality and well built and are excellent value for money. The connectivity is simple it takes under a minute, the audio quality is impressive although slightly lacking in the bass department, but overall a decent set for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Apple

customer_reviews.title: Quietly Impressed
customer_reviews.text: After considerable review of these earbuds I decided to make the purchase. Upon arrival I knew they were not a gimmick and made with quality. Sleek design and packaging and easy to pair up. I haven't tried the apple air pods so can't compare but the sound quality is great and battery life excellent. Very well impressed. The price point is the most attractive point for me. It's also nice to not have the typical white that everyone has!
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my father as a early Christmas present to replace his old earbuds. He was impressed by quality of the sound , by design and long life battery . He mention they hold well in his ear especially since he does active work and move around a lot . Really recommend it. Great affordable price too for good quality
customer_reviews.author: Aida M

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Stylish box. When opened all neatly packed. Simple to pair and simple to follow instructions for the controls. Comfortable in ear pods without paying for a certain fruit branded type. The sound quality is more than acceptable along with the noise cancelling feature. While not the same as the big names in the business you cannot grumble at the price. Only thing of a concern would be the removing of the pods from ear. It’s quite easy to press play so if listening to a podcast when taking them out you may find you pick up in a different place you remember. Might be my hands though.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rowston

customer_reviews.title: The touch controls are terrible
customer_reviews.text: The touch controls do not work. I saw the reviews saying that they were a bit tricky, and thought that's fine I'm sure I'll figure it out. But it's honestly terrible and I have not figured it out because IT DOES NOT WORK. I've tried to get the timing and intensity of taps right but nothing works!! The control for skipping songs NEVER works, ever. The play/pause control occasionally works after multiple tries. I'm so disappointed and I hate using them because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So easy to set up 😊 great sound quality 🎶.
customer_reviews.text: Nicely packaged, so easy to set up, opened the case and they paired straight away. I don't normally like things in my ears, but they are so comfortable, and I have long hair and they don't get caught. They are so easy to use you can tap the ear to turn them up, down, pause, very clever. The sound quality is really clear, great noise cancellation and they have a superb battery life.
customer_reviews.author: L Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price, sound is decent if volume is not too high and I quite liked the functionality. Bluetooth connection was very stable and battery life was phenomenal. Microphone produced very good sound quality in calls, much better than the £270 sony earbuds. Downsides are that the fit was a bit uncomfortable for me. It was also quite tricky to change songs with tripple tap as it does not always work. I decided to return them and get higher quality ones but these are definitely very good value if you're on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% noise cancelling but I would say 85%. Great sound quality but I have to turn up the volume more than I usually do when wearing earphones. the tap feature to skip the song, accept call, etc works but not that sensitive. Sometimes it responds easily sometimes it doesn’t Love the design and convenience! It automatically connects to my iphone when I opened the case. Good for the price
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Stephanie Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Absolute bargain and compare really well with the Apple AirPods that one of my kids has but with the added bonus of being water and sweat resistant. I use them whilst indoor rowing on a Concept 2 and they are a great fit, blocking out the noise so I don’t have to have them blasting the sound out. They paired easily with my devices and the battery is lasting as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Steve 438

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really love these, I'm picky with in-ear headphones but this fit snuggly. Top tip, if you think they don't have much bass, wiggle them around for a bitter fit in your ears! I thought they were in right but a quick mess and suddenly they're actually noise cancelling and good quality sound!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Blower

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality and value.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter instead of replacing faulty Airpods from Apple. I tried them out and for me, they are comfier than the Airpods and brilliant quality, especially at the price. Can see why they are winning awards. Very very impressed. Only thing thats a shame is we cant seem to get white ones in UK. Black only.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality was very impressive
customer_reviews.text: My old headphones recently broke so I was looking for a new pair of headphones and I came across these and I thought I would try them out. Safe to say I was very pleased with my purchase. The sound quality was excellent and it was so simple and easy to pair them to my phone which is a problem I have had with other headphones. Also, I'm into my running and was worried that they might cause me an issue when exercising as they might fall out but after my 5km run they did not budge and stayed safely and securely in my ear. Would definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Crompton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Genuinely happy with these. Have tried Bose and Cambridge Audio in ear pods and couldn’t get them fitted therefore bad quality sound. These were comfortable straight out of the box. Don’t know about phone calls as that’s a bit to clever for me, but listening to my classical music is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Mr K.

customer_reviews.title: great gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband as a gift. This is the first wireless earphone he got and he is happy with it. First, he paired it via bluetooth with his iPhone 11, then it takes about 5 seconds for the earphone to connect to the phone once you open the case (he tested it while playing Youtube video). Its good to use while doing exercise. The size of the case is suitable to carry everywhere, not too small and not too big, will fit into your pocket easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sofi

customer_reviews.title: Great cheap headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical as they are a brand is never heard of. But WhatHi-fi rated them as the best in ear headphones under £75, which gave some reassurance. Suffice to say I had no cause for concern they are great quality, much easier and quicker to set up than previous ones I've had. They are high quality, comfortable sleek looking headphones. My wife liked them so much she ordered a pair.
customer_reviews.author: M. MANNIX

customer_reviews.title: Really nice headphones but...
customer_reviews.text: I really like these headphones, they feel great quality, look good and the audio sound is good. However the audio keeps dropping occasionally for a fraction of a second but is enough to detract from the enjoyment of listening to music, I keep expecting it to happen at any moment. The call quality is also so bad I can't use for calls, it seems fine my end but the other person can't hear me clearly. Maybe I have a faulty set but a real shame as they're so nice otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product, black is an excellent colour to go with, can’t go wrong, and the size is perfect, the quality is very good for the price you pay. I like how it fits very comfortably inside the ear, the battery life is decent but could have been better. Overall this is a solid product and I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Baabor chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound quality with deep bass is amazing for listening to music! Also music and media stops playing when earphones are taken out which is a bonus that you don't find with other true wireless earphones at this price range. Good battery life also. 5 stars from me :)
customer_reviews.author: Husnain ali

customer_reviews.title: The company is not responding, as the clicking on the ear buds doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these this week, the issue is the buttons on the earbuds doesnt work not on the left or right, you cannot play pause a song, cannot take or hang up a call, cannot skip a song...... I contacted the company on the day i received the earphones and the still haven't replied, to help as these are obviously faulty ones. Bad customer service, highly disappointed. Sound is ok, but cannot do anything else else. Please respond to your clients!
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Good (AirPod style) earphones
customer_reviews.text: These are very very good, look really smart both wearing and in the case. Noise cancelling is okay, not expected to be brilliant as they are not active noise cancelling but for passive earphones it’s decent. Connectivity is easy and quality feels very good. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing
customer_reviews.text: You feel the quality when you touch and wear them. The headphones sound great and the features are extraordinary. You can easily control them by touching. And you won't believe how they easily pair with your phone, just open the case, and you are connected. Battery life is more than I asked for. It is really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good earbuds for christmas present
customer_reviews.text: have bought previously earbuds with ANC from the same brand and was quite pleased with their quality. Decided to buy a christmas present from them again as their quality is pretty good
customer_reviews.author: ShoppingEnthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are great value for money. The sound quality is good. They fit well (I struggle with ear buds) and the battery life is great. I use them for music and work calls and they have not disappointed on either. The noise cancellation isn’t perfect, but more that good enough for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: carla smith

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality For A Bargain Price
customer_reviews.text: These wireless earbuds definitly deserve the What HiFi Best Wireless Earbud Award. I'm blown away by the quality and sound you get with these earbuds and the battery life is amazing. They are so comfortable and easy to use especially when I'm working out at home. A perfect gift or Christmas present for people of all ages. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Warren

customer_reviews.title: Overall good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Decent product for it's price, sound quality is alright, battery life kinda ok. If your charging pod is out of battery there's no way to turn your earbuds on (even if they're fully charged) that I know of... Touch controls are not very responsive (especially the song changing taps), I just stopped trying and exclusively change songs from my phone. Microphone is alright. They're all plastic but they look ok. The fit in my ear was not the greatest.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Antonio Chacon

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son's birhday in October, he loves them, fast delivery and well packaged. Will further update in a few months time to see how the battery lasts
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Good Competition to the AirPods for a Fraction of proce
customer_reviews.text: The head phones are pretty good. Sound quality is quite rich and they sit comfortably in the ear. Not sure if noise cancelling is perfect but cuts outside noise well. As good as my first gen applepods. Also nice packaging and easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: M. C. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and sleek earphones
customer_reviews.text: These wireless earphones are very loud and they also connect to the device very quickly and automatically when the case is opened once connected for the first time. They have a very good design and also live up to their name of having multiple awards. I fully reccomend them.
customer_reviews.author: Gaya Manokaran

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is excellent
customer_reviews.text: Only just got them but quality and sound are great, they definitely pack a punch for the size and cost especially as I got them on a deal. Well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Daveyboy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The best earphones I've ever tried. Sound quality is great, perfect for working out. They charge fast and last for so long had them for a week only had to charge them twice. The touch feature is very handy. Very study and an all ground great product
customer_reviews.author: Sana Kauser

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and Functional
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality as well as the Bluetooth range. There were NO issues with connectivity which was my main concern (as this often happens with my speaker). I found that while running the noise cancellation was mildly jarring but otherwise perfect. The battery life overall was slightly better than expected, definitely plenty enough for a long day out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price I didn’t really expect a lot but was blown away at how good the bass really does sound on these and how good they sound overall
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Delighted with these
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are great. Didn’t review quickly as wanted to really give them a few weeks to try. Good sound and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jellis64

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up, easy use and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift! Easy set up, easy use, and long battery life. Brought for a active job so music can be on all day, they are comfortable to wear and the battery life is great. Charging case provided great storage to avoid loss when not using.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: All round good product
customer_reviews.text: Had these a couple of months so far. Battery life is really good. They sound great and general product quality seems great for this price! I am yet to use them for running so not sure how stable they are but for other activities they have stayed in well! They also work perfectly for phone calls
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charging, independently working buds, good sound on media and calls....
customer_reviews.text: I wanted wireless charging, independently working earbuds, good sound quality on music and calls and buds which fitted comfortably. These earfun buds do all of these things and much more. No other buds in this price bracket offer all these things. The case is small, great battery life. All in all, they are great.....in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Nice ear phones, great sound easy to set up and use. Very pleased for the price
customer_reviews.author: Bunnie 101

customer_reviews.title: nice earphones
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for me. I use it for the gym and it is perfect as I am no longer bothered by wires. Sound quality is great and stays in my ears even when doing intense exercises while running and lifting weights.
customer_reviews.author: Trung

customer_reviews.title: poor audio, terrible controls
customer_reviews.text: Constant issues with the devices, poorly fitting resulting in regular touch to reposition resulting in audio play interuptions / volume problems resulting in a fustrating experience, will be returned
customer_reviews.author: Conor Foley

customer_reviews.title: Clear listening and sneaking
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with my purchase. This earbuds is much better than my previous one. The person who I talked with could hear me really clearly even though I was in a noise environment. Recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Soo well packaged. These headphones are really good. The sound quality was not what I expected. It’s good for its price. The battery life is very good too.
customer_reviews.author: Besmellah

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value true wireless buds.
customer_reviews.text: Great value, awarded a best buy by What HiFi and I totally get why. Bought for my wife's new phone and they are easy to use, have decent sound quality and noise cancelling makes phone calls easy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark R Eames

customer_reviews.title: Award winning
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and good audio. Really convenient to use and all the other good reviews speaks for itself!
customer_reviews.author: Ac13

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound! Very pleased *****
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike. They are awesome and even compare to my Bose sound cancelling earbuds with a cable that costed almost 10 times as much! Wish they existed in white colour as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stelios

customer_reviews.title: Nice headphones
customer_reviews.text: They are wonderful headphones. It fits well in the ears. They have a strong and clean sound. The battery has a large capacity
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection
customer_reviews.text: After a few months I began to experience poor connection problems. Only one earphone connects until you reset the earbuds, then finally the right ear stop connecting, so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't last
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED - A couple of weeks later and the right bud keeps getting quiet so lost a couple of stars. Maybe not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: PZM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for a cheap price....
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality & noise cancellation of these earphones are very good. The battery life is good. The earphones do not always respond well when you tap them to do a comand without using your phone
customer_reviews.author: amanda a.

customer_reviews.title: Do not work near wifi router
customer_reviews.text: These don't work very well at all if nearca wifi router. But if an issue as I bought them as a work from home meeting headset!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Read

customer_reviews.title: They were great except for the mic
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones for listening to music, BUT the microphone is useless outdoors. Even the slightest wind will make the other end struggling to hear you. Had to return because of this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Winners
customer_reviews.text: Wow. How can they produce these earbuds for this price? I bought them after they won What HI FI 2020 award and I can see why. I just love them.
customer_reviews.author: victor devizio

customer_reviews.title: Great value wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Connects well via Bluetooth. Not loud enough in some situations, but the sound quality is good. My first pair of wireless earbuds, and I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Alison MW

customer_reviews.title: Make them your BUD... and have ear fun!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality sound, comfortable and easy to wear, even the case charges on a pad. Excellent value & quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon S Lush

customer_reviews.title: Wireless charging feature is a godsend.
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality. Decent sound. Good noise isolation. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ollie Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product off the back of a which review. I’m big on sound quality but didn’t want to spend the ££ on big brands. These are great for the price and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and fit. Lying in bed requires careful positioning of the head or they get louder 🤣
customer_reviews.author: Alistair mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good for a gift
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a better quality sound, better bass, more volume, but it's fine for a product of this price.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Tobon Collazos

customer_reviews.title: Good at the price
customer_reviews.text: Sound is good enough for me at this price, blocks sounds quite well. Auto off not always working but this is a small niggle. I would recommend these buds
customer_reviews.author: h2o

customer_reviews.title: Earfun's are good sofar
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't used the Earfun earbuds much to date that have been good so far and are good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Neil Parkinson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent classy product. Synced with my phone in 2 seconds. Fits in ears snugly and safely. Sound quality good. very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: d ken

product_meta.title: True Wireless Earbuds, EarFun Air Bluetooth 5.0 Earbuds Touch Control with Wireless Charging Case, Built-in 4 Mic, USB-C Quick Charge, Hi-Fi Deep Bass in-Ear Headphones, IPX7 Waterproof, 35H Playtime
feature_bullets: CRYSTAL CLEAR CALLS: Each earbud is equipped with 2 microphones, together the 4 enhanced microphones provide noise-cancelling call technology to effectively block out 80% of background noise and make your voice 3 times clearer, to ensure you’re heard on the other side.

HI-FI SUPERIOR SOUND: EarFun Air Bluetooth earbuds feature dual 6mm composite drivers that produce rich, immersive sound. PEEK + PU high fidelity dynamic drivers deliver deep, resonant bass with authentic treble to match.

SINGLE EARBUD OPTION: Either earbud can be automatically paired to your device for independent use, giving you the flexibility to accommodate the task. Powered by latest Bluetooth 5.0 which dramatically enhances the stability and connection of the earbuds. When opening the carrying case lid, EarFun Air wireless earbuds will power on automatically and pair to your Bluetooth-compatible device.

INTUITIVE TOUCH CONTROL: With intuitive touchpad technology built into both wireless earbuds, you can effortlessly control your music, calls, and volume with a single finger press, freeing your hands from your smartphone. In-ear detection makes your music pauses when you remove either earbud, then starts again the second you put them back in.

UP to 35 HOURS PLAYTIME: The Bluetooth earbuds offers up to 35H play time. A single charge using the provided USB-C charging cable gives you 2 hours of playtime after just 10 minutes of charging. The charging case can also be wirelessly charged by simply placing it on a wireless charger, providing a cable-free charging option.
